content.en: Optimizing Systems with Algorithms: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can optimize various systems and processes using deep reinforcement learning. They are investigating how algorithms can minimize energy consumption in wastewater pumping stations, optimize stormwater system control and flood mitigation, optimize pumps in water distribution systems, optimize carbon storage reservoir management, optimize economic dispatch in combined heat and power systems, optimize water heater control for electricity cost reduction, control hydraulic fracturing for uniform proppant concentration, optimize hydropower reservoir operation, optimize field development in subsurface two-phase flow, optimize district energy management, optimize life-cycle production in oil wells, optimize well control for generalization, optimize energy management in a hybrid photovoltaic-reverse osmosis desalination system, optimize thermochemical production in heavy oil reservoirs, optimize well control in subsurface reservoirs, optimize operation strategy in combined cooling, heating, and power systems, optimize well control in subsurface systems with uncertain geology, control an inverted hydraulic pendulum, optimize hydro-thermal economic dispatch considering uncertainties, and optimize the raw water system of a high-sediment river. These algorithms, such as deep Q-networks, dueling deep q-network, deep deterministic policy gradient, and proximal policy optimization, use statistical learning and deep reinforcement learning techniques to make intelligent decisions and improve efficiency.
content.da: Optimering af systemer med algoritmer: Forskere udforsker, hvordan algoritmer kan optimere forskellige systemer og processer ved hjælp af dyb forstærkninglæring. De undersøger, hvordan algoritmer kan minimere energiforbruget i spildevandspumperstationer, optimere styring af regnvandssystemer og oversvømmelsesafværgelse, optimere pumper i vanddistributionssystemer, optimere håndtering af karbonlagringsreservoirer, optimere økonomisk dispatch i kombinerede varme- og kraftsystemer, optimere vandvarmerstyring for at reducere elomkostninger, styre hydraulisk frakturering for ensartet proppantkoncentration, optimere vandkraftreservoirdrift, optimere feltudvikling i to-fase strømning under overfladen, optimere distriktenergistyring, optimere livscyklusproduktion i oliebrønde, optimere borestyring for generalisering, optimere energistyring i et hybridfotovoltaisk-omvendt osmose afsaltningssystem, optimere termokemisk produktion i tungoliereservoirer, optimere borestyring i underjordiske reservoirer, optimere driftsstrategi i kombinerede køle-, varme- og kraftsystemer, optimere borestyring i underjordiske systemer med usikker geologi, styre et inverteret hydraulisk pendul, optimere hydro-termisk økonomisk dispatch under hensyntagen til usikkerheder, og optimere råvandssystemet i en højsediment flod. Disse algoritmer, såsom dybe Q-netværk, duellerende dybt Q-netværk, dyb deterministisk politikgradient og proximal politikoptimering, bruger statistisk læring og dyb forstærkninglæringsteknikker til at træffe intelligente beslutninger og forbedre effektiviteten.
